fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.types

Interface ITextType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IType

    public interface ITextType
extends IType
    Cell data type for text types.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be immutable and therefore completely thread-safe.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMaximumLength()
      Gets the (optional) length restriction for the data value for the associated cell.
      boolean isEnum()
      Indicates if the text type is limited to a fixed enumeration of values.
      boolean isLargeObject()
      Indicates if the text type is a large object ("BLOB").
      boolean isLocalized()
      Indicates if the text type encapsulates multiple localized values.
      boolean isUri()
      Indicates if the text type is URI-formatted.

    • Method Detail

      • isLargeObject

        boolean isLargeObject()
        Indicates if the text type is a large object ("BLOB"). Large objects should preferably be accessed using data streams, to avoid performance issues and excessive memory usage.
        Returns:
        true if the text values for the cell to which this type applies should be treated as large objects.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        ITextData.getValueReader(), ITextData.getValueWriter()

      • isLocalized

        boolean isLocalized()
        Indicates if the text type encapsulates multiple localized values.
        Returns:
        true if the text values for the cell to which this type applies should be treated as localized.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        ITranslated.getTextLocales(), ITranslated.getLocalText(java.util.Locale), ITextData.setLocalText(java.util.Locale, String)

      • getMaximumLength

        int getMaximumLength()
        Gets the (optional) length restriction for the data value for the associated cell.
        Returns:
        the maximum length for the cell to which this type applies. If -1, the length is unlimited.
        Since:
        1.0

      • isEnum

        boolean isEnum()
        Indicates if the text type is limited to a fixed enumeration of values.
        Returns:
        true if the values are defined in a fixed set, or false if either a large range of patterns (or any arbitrary text) is possible.
        Since:
        1.0

      • isUri

        boolean isUri()
        Indicates if the text type is URI-formatted.

        URI-formatted values, when provided, start with a protocol string, such as "http:", "mailto:", "tel:" or "callto:" (this list is not exhaustive).

        Returns:
        true if the values are provided in URI-format, and expected in URI-format, otherwise false.
        Since:
        1.0
